pkgmetadata.longdescription: fastbencode===========fastbencode is an implementation of the bencode serialization format originallyused by BitTorrent.The package includes both a pure-Python version and an optional C extensionbased on Cython. Both provide the same functionality, but the C extensionprovides significantly better performance.Example: >>> from fastbencode import bencode, bdecode >>> bencode([1, 2, b'a', {b'd': 3}]) b'li1ei2e1:ad1:di3eee' >>> bdecode(bencode([1, 2, b'a', {b'd': 3}])) [1, 2, b'a', {b'd': 3}]License=======fastbencode is available under the GNU GPL, version 2 or later.Copyright=========* Original Pure-Python bencoder (c) Petru Paler* Cython version and modifications (c) Canonical Ltd* Split out from Bazaar/Breezy by Jelmer VernooÄ³
